text:
*LogRocket is hiring a Content Marketing Manager* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

LogRocket is a Series B SaaS startup with one helluva content operation. The blog gets 3 million monthly uniques. This hire will be the seventh on the content team, with 4-6 more hires coming later this year.

This person will be part of LogRocket's editorial team, working with a pool of 450 freelancers to assign, edit and publish content. This is a big-time content operation and you'll get to learn a lot about what it takes to reach this kind of scale.

Of note: LogRocket will be returning to its Boston office at some point. This person should be within striking distance and be able to work in the office 2-3 days/week when it's safe.


*Learn more and apply here:* <https://jobs.superpath.co/job/23330-content-marketing-manager-logrocket>

<@U01CHG2T38U>

*Webflow is hiring a Social Media Associate* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

This role will help shape the online community and social media presence for Webflow, a platform that’s redefining how web design and development work. The social media associate is a remote-friendly role (for a timezone that overlaps significantly with the US). You'll act as the “voice” of Webflow on the social media platforms we love: Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, LinkedIn, and TikTok — and expand our presence to other platforms, as appropriate. Thie role requires you to understand social platforms, be willing to learn, and be a great communicator and collaborator. Bonus if you're familar with Webflow, the no code/low code space, and/or "Design Twitter."



*Learn more and apply here:* <https://boards.greenhouse.io/webflow/jobs/2924470>

<@U01DE3REJUC>
i promise this is a very fun role
